question: Which Indian sportsperson has won the Most Valuable Player' (MVP) award at the Basketball Without Borders Asia 2018?
explanation: Sanjana Ramesh has won the \'Most Valuable Player\' (MVP) award at the Basketball Without Borders Asia 2018, which featured 66 campers from 16 countries from the Asia-Pacific region. Her compatriot Vaishnavi Yadav won the \'Girls Grit Award\' in the camp. The camp got underway with the girls championship game between the New York Liberty and the Minnesota Lynx. Coached on the sidelines by Ruth Riley and Sakshi Sheoran, the Lynx defeated the Liberty 20-13.
